title: Contrastive Phonetics and Phonology Intensive Short-Term Course Utilizing Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic linguistic knowledge (fundamental concepts of phonetics and phonology)
context.additional_context: Blended design responding to post-pandemic learning environment changes, featuring flexible mobile-based learning progression

learning_goals: Accurately identify the phonemic systems of minimal pairs through contrastive phonetic analysis with over 80% accuracy
Experiment at least three times with cross-linguistic pronunciation differences using the speech comparison tools provided in the blended learning platform
Submit a 5-page report comparing and analyzing the phonemic systems of Korean and English through project-based assessment
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
